attributes.action: Community Stand Against Building Plans On The Tiffey Valley Wymondham.
attributes.additional_details:
HELP PETITION AGAINST BUILDING ON THE TIFFEY VALLEY!

IN ONE WEEK THE PLANS TO BUILD ON THIS HISTORIC PIECE OF LAND WILL BE REVIEWED BY THE SECRETARY OF STATE.

PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION TO SHOW THAT YOUR AGAINST ANY PLANS TO BUILD ON THE TIFFEY VALLEY, AND THAT YOU WANT OUR MINISTER TO STAND WITH US AGAINST THE PLANS; IN ORDER TO PRESERVE THIS PIECE OF HERITAGE FOR THE COMMUNITY AND FOR GENERATIONS IN THE FUTURE!

Thank you in advance for your action!
